name: Pulse Optional
description:
Pulse Optional is a mix between traditional top down shooter and dating simulator. The game takes place in a city swarming with zombies and goes on for a couple of days.

The game is heavily story driven and players choices determine the games progress and ending.

The main gameplay loop consist of making choices during the visual novel segments and walking to target locations while slaying zombies and buying goods such as new weaponry.

This game was created for Tampere University of Applied Sciences, GameCamp 2021.
